text: Francis Davis "Frank" Chapot (February 24, 1932 - June 20, 2016) was an American equestrian. He competed at six Olympic Games from 1956 until his final effort in 1976 where he won two silver medals in the Team Show Jumping. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1932 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American equestrians Category:Olympic silver medalists for the United States Category:People from Camden, New Jersey Category:American show jumping riders Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey Category:Olympic equestrians for the United States
title: Frank Chapot
